mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auth_role(role_id, role_name, description, status) VALUES ( #{roleId}, #{roleName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM auth_role WHERE role_name = #{roleName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT role_id, role_name, description, status FROM auth_role
status = #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER} and
role_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{roleName}), '%')
ORDER BY role_name
